item.title: Penn Jillette on Science and Religion
item.description: John Gruber recently posted this interesting quote from Penn Jillette, of Penn and Teller fame: There is no god and thatâ€™s the simple truth. There might be some other nonsense in its place, but not that exact nonsense. If all of science were wiped out, it would still be true and someone would find a way to figure it all out again.
